thread.title: Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell look 'totally smitten' as first snaps with baby Caben suggest possible reconciliation
thread.title_full: Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell look 'totally smitten' as first snaps with baby Caben suggest possible reconciliation

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell look 'totally smitten' as first snaps with baby Caben suggest possible reconciliation
text:
Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell look 'totally smitten' as first snaps with baby Caben suggest possible reconciliation Body language expert Judi Jones suggests the former lovers are back on the same page Share Could Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell mend their relationship? (Photo: WENN.com) Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell have been spotted out and about with their baby for the first time - and they look absolutely smitten. 
The proud parents - who have had more than their share of drama throughout the former Hollyoaks actress' pregnancy - looked to have put their feud behind them and focus on their newborn son Caben-Albi. 
Steph and Jeremy were seen walking together in a park in Liverpool, beaming as they spent some quality time with the adorable little boy. Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell took their newborn son for a walk (Photo: WENN.com) The former lovers looked smitten with Caben-Albi (Photo: WENN.com) 
Body language expert Judi Jones exclusively tells the Mirror Online: "No matter how much aggro has gone on between Stephanie and Jeremy it's clear from their mirroring here that they are both totally smitten with the baby. Read More 
"As they peer over the pram their facial expressions are twinned thanks to their matching smiles and when Jeremy holds the baby Stephanie fusses over him like any other anxious new mother. They couldn't stop smiling (Photo: WENN.com) It's the first time they've been spotted together with their son (Photo: WENN.com) 
"These two clearly have a load of old gripes and resentments to get over and it goes without saying a baby should never be seen as sticking plaster for a relationship, especially one as broke as theirs was but - for these poses at least - it looks as though they are clearly very like-minded when it comes to being tickled pink about their news." 
She adds that Jez has a "soppy smile of love" on his face in the pictures, which show him gazing adoringly at his son. Judy Jones said they look "tickled pink" about their news (Photo: WENN.com) Jeremy was seen holding his son (Photo: WENN.com) 
She shared three rosy-cheeked smiling emojis alongside a post which read: "A Sunday well spent brings a week of content." They enjoyed quality time together (Photo: WENN.com) Steph shared this sweet snap of Caben-Albi (Photo: stephdavis77/Twitter) 
The tattooed hunk met the actress last year when they both took part in Celebrity Big Brother . 
They fell in love and continued dating on the outside world until things turned sour a few months later. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
